about_the_game:
Tribe Quest

is a roguelite action-adventure where you embark on a perilous journey at the behest of your tribe's leader.

Travel, Gather and Craft!

In this procedurally generated world, resource gathering is essential for your survival. Explore forests, traverse deserts, climb mountains, and venture into creepy caves in your search for resources. With each discovery, unlock the potential to craft tools and weapons that will bolster your chances of overcoming the dangers ahead.

Hunt for food!

Make sure to hunt and cook, as a lack of food will leave you hungry and weakened, risking the very survival of your expedition.

Swap characters and give commands!

You have the ability to switch between all the characters in your team. You can also give them orders such as follow, guard, forage or attack.

Protect your wagon!

Your ox wagon serves as a mobile base and an expanded inventory. Protect it or risk losing your items.

Fight monsters!

Prepare to face an array of foes, ranging from cowardly goblins to fearless skeletons guarding ancient ruins. Beware of cannibals, whose menacing hunger poses a constant threat. Pay up or fight your way out of bandit ambushes.

Travel the hexagonal map!

Each day, you choose which hexagon to explore. Sending a scout will help you determine the dangers or any special resources that could be found there.

Tribe Quest

Remember, the fate of your tribe rests on your shoulders. Will you rise to the challenge and triumph?

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, 64 bit
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
